title: VERY CONCERNED
body: So as im sure 90% of you are aware of this link going around claiming for a riot christmas rp giveaway. ive clicked the link while LoL was open on my computer! Whats going to happen? is my account going to be hacked?

replies.body: Bury computer. Now, before it infects you. Source, me, CompSci Grad.

inb4 Keylogger!!!! But like I've said on other posts. There is really no such thing as a legitimate site that gives you benefits in League of Legends. Any site that is not directly linked and 'sponsored' by Riot Games should be considered as suspect and not touched. Any site that requires you to provide account details, even if it's just a summoner name should not be touched. 

Regards, 
lols =)
Don't sign in for the time being, scan your comp if you do important sign ins like netbanking or whatever on your computer.
Assuming you didn't run anything on the website or sign in there.. nothing.
